testcase.classname: User should be able to see current customer cards, and create new customer cards
testcase.name: Displaying current customer cards
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to URL and select BriteErpDemo database......................passed And login with valid credentials............................................passed When navigate CRM module....................................................passed Then go to Customers page...................................................passed When Customers header is displayed..........................................passed Then customer cards exist on the page.......................................passed
